```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(jsonlite)
theme_set(theme_linedraw())
#devtools::install_github("juliasilge/silgelib")

```

```{r}
recentes = fromJSON("http://150.165.85.12:41205/get_today_people_count") %>% 
    as.tibble() %>% 
    mutate(t = ymd_hms(timestamps))
```


```{r}
recentes %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = t, y = data)) + 
    geom_point() + 
    geom_line()
```
